name: The Game is A Liar
description:
The Game is a submission to The Community Game Jam 2019!

The Game is A Liar - Though it guides you to your goal. What it says has meaning you must follow. The guidlines will lead you towards the goal.

The controls are-

  • Left and Right Arrow keys to move
  • Space to jump

Please give your feedback on the game in the comments section. All kinds of feedbacks are welcome and we appreciate it.

Creators - Anish Sharma and Abhijit C.V.
